thread.title: VAN SCHAICK/BONNIE M
thread.title_full: ASAP Tickets 7000+ reviewed by VAN SCHAICK/BONNIE M

author: VAN SCHAICK/BONNIE M
title: VAN SCHAICK/BONNIE M
text: The first person I talked with I could not understand as her English was so slurred and she didn't understand me. I called back and asked for the one person I had dealt with before---Sharon----and all was well after that. My only disappointment was that I could not get the seating I wanted even 2 months before departure.
